rev.desc.rev.desc: Signal 11 error happens when apply custom upgrade from SM9.40
Invoke upgradeConvert.convertSM94 with the second parameter true.
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Upgrade cannot continue in the correct point when it is stopped during convert
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade SM9.3x and 9.4x non-pd to SM9.50 Hybrid
Make the parameters work
SM9.50 Applications Upgrade Utility: Support to upgrade SM9.3x and 9.4x non-pd to SM9.50 Hybrid
update panel "exit.normal", change jscall("upgradeConvert.postConvert") to jscall("upgradeConvert.convertSM94")
update panel "exit.error.msg", turn on counters
For pd4 upgaded system the "escalation type" value for RFA&RFI interaction category should be "incident"
Call upgradeConvert.fixPdData
Upgrade requirement for Pink modules
Disable PINK for all PDs
Update codes to support upgrade from 9.3x PD to 9.40
Handle upgrade result for PD - fix handwriting mistake
Some datadicts update are lost when upgrade from 711 and 931
Invoke the function SLMEnableManager.enableSlaDatadict
Assignee link issue on Request Form
Update codes to support upgrade from 9.3x PD to 9.40
Handle upgrade result for PD
Switch option for Interaction is not correct when upgrade from PD4
For PD4, invoke ServiceDeskSwitch.setSettingValue to set sd.switch to true
Update codes to support upgrade from 9.3x PD to 9.40
Do not invoke enableUpdate but only invoke enableDatadict
Upgrade requirement for Pink modules
enable PINK for PD except for PDCP4
Update codes to support upgrade from 9.3x PD to 9.40
Invoke enableUpdated for every module as trigger need to be closed before run request enable update.
Update codes to support upgrade from 9.3x PD to 9.40
Update codes to support upgrade from 9.3x non-PD to 9.40

descript.descript: Signal 11 error happens when apply custom upgrade from SM9.40
Invoke upgradeConvert.convertSM94 with the second parameter true.

update panel "exit.normal", change jscall("upgradeConvert.postConvert") to jscall("upgradeConvert.convertSM94")
update panel "exit.error.msg", turn on counters
For pd4 upgaded system the "escalation type" value for RFA&RFI interaction category should be "incident"
Call upgradeConvert.fixPdData
Upgrade requirement for Pink modules
Disable PINK for all PDs

Invoke the function SLMEnableManager.enableSlaDatadict
Assignee link issue on Request Form
Update codes to support upgrade from 9.3x PD to 9.40
Handle upgrade result for PD
Switch option for Interaction is not correct when upgrade from PD4
For PD4, invoke ServiceDeskSwitch.setSettingValue to set sd.switch to true

Do not invoke enableUpdate but only invoke enableDatadict

enable PINK for PD except for PDCP4
